featured.text: The largest one, named “Emmanuel,” weighs over 13 tons.
But due to their poor acoustic quality, all of the bells were replaced in 2013—except for Emmanuel, which 25 its renowned, excellent sound.

definition.zh_def: 以馬內利，意指「上帝與我們同在」的名字，常用於基督教文獻中。
definition.en_def: Emmanuel is a name meaning 'God with us,' often used in Christian contexts.
definition.example: The church celebrated Christmas by singing songs that praised Emmanuel.
